Body:
Description: Puedo realizar una excepción de URL en una política de content aware? me pueden indicar los pasos a realizar?
Gracias

What We've Learned Updated: 3/31/2025

- Provided steps to allow a specific URL in a CAP policy
- Sent customer follow email
Next Steps Updated: Waiting on customer's response

What We've Learned Updated: 4/1/2025

- Customer has questions relating to how to implement DPI for all devices and what could affect these devices using DPI
- Sent customer information on how to configure DPI globally and possible settings to implement if she experiences issues using DPI as a global setting.
